titleStmt.title: The crying sinnes reproved whereof the rulers and people of England, are highly guilty ... : with meek exhortations to this present Parliament ... / E.B.
titleStmt.author: Burrough, Edward, 1634-1662.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
